summary:
Harry: Draco can you pass the sugar please
Draco: *places his hand in Harry’s outstretched palm*
Harry: ...
Draco: *blushing...
body:
Harry: Draco can you pass the sugar please

Draco: *places his hand in Harry’s outstretched palm*

Harry: …

Draco: *blushing because he was cute*

Harry: all I want is some god damn tea must we do this every morning?

blog.description: Harry Potter headcanons, fanfiction and other stuff. Romione, Linny, Hinny and Ronarry, plus occasional other ships. Ron Weasley Defense Squad. Fancier of Rupert Grint and Evanna Lynch. My inbox is open for submissions and ideas.  FFN and AO3 username- headcanonsandmore

tags: harry and hermione love ron SO MUCH you guys and it's beautiful!
hermione granger started the ron weasley defense/defence squad
summary: "Harry, Hermione- do you think the film series did Ron an injustice?"
title: "Harry, Hermione- do you think the film series did Ron an injustice?"
body:
Harry and Hermione: INJUSTICE?! INJUSTICE?! INJUSTICE IS AN UNDERSTATEMENT!
Ron: Oh merlin, here we go....
Harry: LET ME TELL YOU SOMETHING ABOUT RON WEASLEY, OKAY!
HERMIONE: THIS BEAUTIFUL REDHEADED MAN IS A GIFT TO THE WORLD! 
Ron: I'm just letting you know; you're going to regret asking that question in about five hours...
Harry: RONALD BILIUS WEASLEY SACRIFICED HIMSELF AT THE AGE OF TWELVE FOR US! HE IS BRAVE AND KIND, AND THOSE FILMS COMPLETELY MISSED THE POINT OF HIS ENTIRE CHARACTER!
Hermione: MY HUSBAND AND LOVE-OF-MY-LIFE DESERVED BETTER THAN WHAT THOSE FILMS DID TO HIM! 
Ron: You might want to settle in; they're going to go on like this for a while...and they haven't even mentioned the 'anti Steve Kloves' badges yet...

summary: Wolfstar shippers ain’t playing around with fanmixes on Spotify (this one has 200 tracks!) It’s a good mix of both contemporary...
caption: Wolfstar shippers ain’t playing around with fanmixes on Spotify (this one has 200 tracks!) It’s a good mix of both contemporary music and era-accurate music from Remus and Sirius’ youth (the late ‘60s, ‘70s, and early ‘80s).

blog.description:
Ro - Scandinavia - full time dumbass

•

killjoy

•

a lot of bands, a lot of gay, a lot of personal idiocy

•

intersectionality is kind of a big deal so don’t be dumb

•

i just want hugs and sleep and bread

•

ask weird af questions, slide into my DM's, submit a photo of a cat, or do whatever else you damn well please as long as you're not being an asshole

•

i'll go cry now

summary: I recently signed up to pottermore, and you know what my patronus was ? A mole, a god damn mole, Im not sure how to feel about...
question: I recently signed up to pottermore, and you know what my patronus was ? A mole, a god damn mole, Im not sure how to feel about this .  What's your patronus ?
answer:
fight me on this: you cannot trust pottermore!
it says MY PATRONIS IS A FUCKING EEL
but no way am i letting anyone but me decide what my patronus, my house, and my wand is.
so to actually answer your question: my patronus is a panther
.
and now you go find your patronus. it can be a mole if you feel like it’s a mole (moles are adorable) but if you don’t think your patronus to be a mole THEN ITS NOT A MOLE
. tell me when you’ve felt your way (the only real way to do it) to your patronus

. tell me when you’ve felt your way (the only real way to do it) to your patronus

summary: The First Topic: A woman who never gave up-
body:
The First Topic: A woman who never gave up-

An English woman writer has a book series pushing the lines of human imagination. She is JK Rowling. Her life story is like a magical tale.

We always hear that, “I read a book and it changed my life.” Absolutely everyone has a book which impressed herself of himself in the past, in spite of this you can find just a few fantastic books which impress anybody. Alright, JK Rowling is so succesful but what is her story?

To be continued…

blog.name: back-to-hogwartsrp-promo
blog.title: Back to Hogwarts Promo
blog.description: Back to Hogwarts is a brand new canon, golden trio era redo roleplay begining in year four.

summary:
Fourth year at Hogwarts for Harry Potter is fast 
approaching and who knows what lies in store for the students. This 
upcoming...
body:
Fourth year at Hogwarts for Harry Potter is fast approaching and who knows what lies in store for the students. This upcoming year will be a special one, as Hogwarts will host The Triwizard Tournament! Hogwarts will have the pleasure of bringing together witches and wizards from two other schools to find the next champion!

Before the school year the Quidditch world cup is due to be held in England. Rumour has it it’s going to be a tough competition.  Who will win? How will we get there? Which team will you be supporting?

Back to Hogwarts RP, a new canon, golden trio era roleplay. Follow the student’s journey through the upcoming year as they face the many challenges thrown at them by the tournament and more importantly, school!

Home   Ask  Apply

blog.title: Hogwarts Students
blog.description: I'm 16 years old and I wouldn't have made it to this age without music.

title: The ballet
body:
Remember when Draco said: “Training for the ballet, Potter?”

What if it wasn’t a joke/insult? Like, there’s a ballet at hogwarts and they are casting students for the ballet show and Draco and Harry both want the same role and he was just really wondering if he’s already training? Maybe he wanted to practise together? 

But now we’re comming to the real question… Who was teaching them? Was it Hagrid? Or Mcgonagall? Maybe it was Dumbledore himself?

body:
Ron: Oh, Merlin! Oh, Merlin! I'm scarred for life!
Pansy: What's wrong with Ron?

Hermione: He's an idiot
